entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 then light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
